hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Religion will continue to prevail as long as people hasten to break the fast, because the Jews and the Christians delay doing so

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُسْتَحَبُّ مِنْ تَعْجِيلِ الْفِطْرِ
chapter.eng-name: The Recommendation Of Hastening To Break The Fast
